snippet: For sore muscles, ice is not always the panacea that most of us believe it to be, and in some instances, it can be counterproductive.
abstract: For sore muscles, ice is not always the panacea that most of us believe it to be, and in some instances, it can be counterproductive.

headline.main: Why Ice May Be Bad for Sore Muscles
headline.print_headline: Phys Ed: Why Ice May Not Be Good for Sore Muscles
